movie.plot: A hot shot Washington DC lobbyist and his protégé go down hard as their schemes to peddle influence lead to corruption and murder.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

events.title: Jack Abramoff is sentenced to 70 months in prison
Jack Abramoff is released from prison into a half way house
Jack Abramoff is released from his half way house
